member.summary: This will set the ActiveMediaServicePlaybackState to the one found This will compare to values under MediaServiceProviderData.Feedback.ActiveMediaServicePlaybackState This will set the ActiveMediaService play state, and set the rest to Stopped
member.param: Response from device with only relevent data about the playback feedback (only include data that matches the values in the dictionary)

member.name: M:Crestron.RAD.DeviceTypes.CableBox.ACableBoxProtocol.DeConstructMediaServiceSubscriptionStateFeedback(System.String)
member.summary: No base implementation

member.name: P:Crestron.RAD.DeviceTypes.CableBox.Feedback.MinimumResponseTime
member.summary: The minimum amount of time in ms an application would need to wait before expecting the driver to report true feedback after an operation.

member.name: P:Crestron.RAD.DeviceTypes.CableBox.Feedback.MaximumResponseTime
member.summary: The maximum amount of time in ms an application would need to wait before expecting the driver to report true feedback after an operation.

member.name: P:Crestron.RAD.DeviceTypes.CableBox.Feedback.SupportsUnsolicitedFeedback
member.summary: Lets a driver define if the API supports providing updates without polling. If this is enabled, then the driver's polling sequence will only be sent until each individual poll command receives a response. The driver will poll again like this if the connection state goes from false to true.

member.name: P:Crestron.RAD.DeviceTypes.CableBox.SimplCableBox.SimplArrowDirectionsSupported
member.summary: [0] Up [1] Down [2] Left [3] Right

member.name: P:Crestron.RAD.DeviceTypes.CableBox.SimplCableBox.SimplColorKeysSupported
member.summary: [0]Red [1]Green [2]Blue [3]Yellow

member.name: M:Crestron.RAD.DeviceTypes.CableBox.SimplCableBox.SimplSelectMediaService(System.String)
member.summary: Selects a media service by ID. S+ will call this method with the ID instead of index so no extra processing is needed here

member.name: M:Crestron.RAD.DeviceTypes.CableBox.SimplCableBox.SetupMediaServices
member.summary: Sets up all the media services for S+ to reference Not used by IR drivers currently

member.name: M:Crestron.RAD.DeviceTypes.CableBox.SimplCableBox.ExtractBitmapToHtmlDirectory(System.Byte[],System.String)

member.returns: Path to image file on file system in HTML directory
